name: Cavernous Companions
description:
My entry for Riggy2k3's "DEPENDABLE FRIEND" Jam.

Play as a little girl who gets lost in some spooky caverns and tries to find her way out with the help of a newfound friend!

Super short game, maybe 5-10 minutes at most to play through.

PATCH NOTE 1.1

You can't move anymore during the first meeting of the monster.
